item.title: Purpose of This Blog
item.description: This is a personal blog. Although I hope the readers (who knows? Maybe the blog will blow up one day) can take away a lot from reading my posts, the main purpose of the blog is to document my observations, opinions and growths. As of right now, the blog will be mainly on computer science, math, life in general, my takeaways on current events, and music/book reviews.
